solution_line_template: There are a total of {num_vans} vans x {students_per_van} students = <<{num_vans}*{students_per_van}={total_students}>>{total_students} students.
If {num_boys} are boys, then {total_students} - {num_boys} = <<{total_students}-{num_boys}={num_girls}>>{num_girls} of these students are girls.
